metatags.author: Jay Hathaway
metatags.og:title: Heroic Smuggler Nearly Snuck 48,000 Beers Into Saudi Arabia Disguised as Pepsi
metatags.og:description: Saudi Arabia’s alcohol laws are notoriously strict—so strict that a 74-year-old British man just finished a year in a Jeddah prison and nearly faced 350 lashes over possession of homemade wine. Knowing the risks, one heroic man recently tried to smuggle 48,000 beers into the country dressed up as Pepsi cans.
